abilityDescription:
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "BE3501F241346871B1C2E5A924350EEB", "Thrust your spear in front of you in a series of attacks.  

1. Hit 1 - $hit1.max$
2. Hit 2 - $hit2.max$
3. Hit 3 - $hit3.max$
4. {Effect:Weapon_Description_Finisher} - 
		$hit4.max$ 
		{formula:WeaponCombo_FinisherProcEligible:{formula:Weapon_SkillTree_DeadlyFinisherProcChance.%} chance to instead trigger a {effect:Weapon_Description_DeadlyFinisher} -
						{hit5.max}
						{hit6.max}
						{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Bleed:Applies {effect:Status_Bleeding} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Snare:Applies {effect:Status_Snared} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Wound:Applies {effect:Status_Wounded} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Daze:Applies {effect:Status_Dazed} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Stagger:Applies {effect:Status_Staggered} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Burning:Applies {effect:Status_Burning} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Chilled:Applies {effect:Status_Chilled} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Finisher_Volatile:Applies {effect:Status_Volatile} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Proc_SwordmastersSwiftness:
						Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_SwordmastersSwiftness_ComboTooltipReference}}{!skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_FinisherMod:{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Concussion:
						Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_ComboTooltipReference}}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Proc_RefreshingFollowthrough:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_RefreshingFollowthrough}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Proc_Ward:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_Ward}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_RhythmicSwings:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_RhythmicSwings}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_InnerFire:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_InnerFire}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_FinisherMod:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_ComboTooltipReference}}}{formula:WeaponCombo_ExtendedFinisherProcEligible:
5. {Effect:Weapon_Description_ExtendedFinisher} - 
		{hit7.max}
		{hit8.max}
		{formula:WeaponCombo_ExtendedFinisherProcEligible:{formula:Weapon_SkillTree_DeadlyExtendedFinisherProcChance.%} chance to instead trigger a {effect:Weapon_Description_DeadlyExtendedFinisher} -
						{hit9.max}
						{hit10.max}
						{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Bleed:Applies {effect:Status_Bleeding} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Snare:Applies {effect:Status_Snared} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Wound:Applies {effect:Status_Wounded} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Daze:Applies {effect:Status_Dazed} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Stagger:Applies {effect:Status_Staggered} to struck targets}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Echo:Triggers {effect:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_Proc_Echo}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_ExtendedFinisher_PerfectTiming:Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_PerfectTiming}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Proc_SwordmastersSwiftness:
						Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_SwordmastersSwiftness_ComboTooltipReference}}{!skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_ExtendedFinisherMod:{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Concussion:
						Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_ComboTooltipReference}}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Proc_RefreshingFollowthrough:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_RefreshingFollowthrough}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Proc_Ward:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Proc_Ward}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_RhythmicSwings:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_RhythmicSwings}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_InnerFire:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Capstone_InnerFire}}{skill:ActiveWeapon:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_ExtendedFinisherMod:
		Triggers {effect:Weapon_Passive_Concussion_ComboTooltipReference}}}}")
name: WeaponCombo_Melee_2H_Spear
